meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Obsolete</kanji> <kanji>ruins</kanji> are places that are abandoned because nobody can run them anymore (due to being obsolete, or due to not having money, or due to whatever else). These things are <vocabulary>ruins</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>abandoned buildings</vocabulary>. People like to explore these, a lot.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
